===Etymology===
From {{m|ja|無|sc=Jpan|tr=mu||zero}} + {{m|ja|宗|sc=Jpan|tr=shu||sect}} + {{m|ja|教|sc=Jpan|tr=kyō||suffix for doctrine}}<ref>{{cite-book|title=Kodansha's ''furigana'' Japanese Dictionary|publisher=Kodansha Inc.|location=Japan|year=1999}}</ref>

===Noun===

# no religious affiliation
